citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 am
on 01/20/2015. After making contact by telephone, it was relayed that the licensee would be unavailable for the
next 2 1/2 to 3 hours.
Additional Inspectors
Osborne Stephanie, Animal Care Inspector
